5     c    i    Requires high temp/pressure âœ“                                                                                                2 max
                Must overcome Coulomb/intermolecular repulsion âœ“
                Difficult to contain / control Â«at high temp/pressureÂ» âœ“
                Difficult to produce excess energy/often energy input greater than output / OWTTE âœ“

                Difficult to maintain/sustain a constant reaction rate âœ“
